name: Red Terror(Shrek)
description:
You are a simple man that is driving home, when you lose all your gas, and and have to find a way home. Try to survive RED Shrek, and get all the onions.

WASD- Move

Mouse- Look

F- Toggle Flashlight

Space- Jump

LShift- Sprint

Thanks to Fopull for helping us out with some code :Fopull - itch.io

Thanks to Mrs. West for the funding

Thanks to all of our game testers throughout
